file.name: mp_delivery.yaml
file.content:
openapi: 3.0.0
servers:
  - url: https://api.mercadopago.com
info:
  title: Mercado Pago API Reference
  version: '1.0'
paths:
  /proximity-integration/v1/orders/{shipment_id}:
    get:
      tags:
        - $ref: '#/tags/mp-delivery'
      summary: Get order by shipment ID
      description: Retrieve the information of an order by its shipment ID.
      parameters:
        - name: shipment_id
          in: path
          description: Shipment ID of the order.
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
            example:  41034141533
      responses:
        '200':
          description: Success
          content:
            application/json:
               schema:          
                type: object
                properties:
                  id:
                    type: string
                    example: "41034141533"
                    description: Shipment ID of the order.
                  type:
                    type: string
                    example: "DELIVERY"
                    description: This field refers to the way in which the order will be delivered.
                    enum:
                      - DELIVERY -- the restaurant will be responsible for delivering the order.
                      - TAKEOUT -- the buyer will pick up the order from the restaurant.
                  displayId:
                    type: string
                    example: "9129"
                    description: Order Id shown in the Ordering Application interface for the Buyer.
                  createdAt:
                    type: string
                    example: "2022-02-16T21:20:15.227Z"
                    description: Order creation time (UTC date-time in ISO timestamp format).
                  orderTiming:
                    type: string
                    example: "INSTANT"
                    description: Scheduled time to start preparing an order. By now, only the start immediately is implemented, and the value of this field will always be INSTANT.
                  preparationStartDateTime: 
                    type: string
                    example: "2022-02-16T21:20:47.755Z"
                    description: Value referring to the start of preparation of an order. For now, the value contained in this field will be the time when the order changed its state to ready_to_ship/ready_to_print. UTC date-time in ISO timestamp format. 
                  merchant:
                    type: object
                    description: Informations about the seller.
                    properties:
                      id: 
                        type: string
                        example: "1070421029"
                        description: User ID of the restaurant account linked to Mercado Pago.
                      name: 
                        type: string
                        example: Doc's Store
                        description: Name of the restaurant.
                  items:
                    type: array
                    description: Array of objects that contain the item information for an order.
                    items:
                      type: object
                      properties:
                        id: 
                          type: string
                          example: "MLA1122759502"
                          description: ID of the item.
                        name:
                          type: string
                          example: "Burrito Combo Refrigerante"
                          description: Name of the item.
                        externalCode:
                          type: string
                          example: "1215451"
                          description: External code for an item which can be used by point of sale.
                        unit: 
                          type: string
                          example: "UNIT"
                          description: Measure unit of the item. By now, only the UNIT value is available
                        quantity:
                          type: number
                          example: 2
                          description: The quantity of the item.
                        specialInstructions:
                          type: string
                          example: "No quiero cebolla."
                          description: Comment about the ordered item inserted by the buyer.
                        options:
                          type: array
                          description: Field referring to the complements of an item. If the ordered item has no complements, this field will be empty.
                          items:
                            type: object
                            properties:
                              id:
                                type: string
                                example: "MLA1122707065"
                                description: ID of the complement item.
                              name: 
                                type: string
                                example: "Soda"
                                description: Name of the complement item.
                              externalCode:
                                type: string
                                example: "151545"
                                description: External code for a complement item which can be used by a point of sale.
                              unit:
                                type: string
                                example: "UNIT"
                                description: Measure unit of the complement item. By now, only the UNIT value is available
                              quantity:
                                type: number
                                example: 2
                                description: The quantity of the complement item.
                              unitPrice:
                                type: object
                                description: Unit price of a complement item.
                                properties:
                                  value:
                                    type: number
                                    example: 100.0
                                    description: Unit price of a complement item.
                                  currency:
                                    type: string
                                    example: "ARS"
                                    description: Currency related to price.
                              totalPrice:
                                type: object
                                description: The total price of a complement item.
                                properties: 
                                  value: 
                                    type: number
                                    example: 200.0
                                    description: The total price of a complement item (unitPrice * quantity).
                                  currency:
                                    type: string
                                    example: "ARS"
                                    description: Currency related to price.
                              extension:
                                type: object
                                properties:
                                  group: 
                                    type: string
                                    example: "Combo with soda"
                                    description: Name of the group that the complement item selected belongs to.
                        unitPrice:
                          type: object
                          description: Unit price of the selected item.
                          properties:
                            value:
                              type: number
                              example: 300.0
                              description: Unit price of the selected item.
                            currency: 
                              type: string
                              example: "ARS"
                              description: Currency related to price.
                        optionsPrice:
                          type: object
                          description: Sum of the prices of the complements of an item.
                          properties:
                            value:
                              type: number
                              example: 200.0
                              description: Sum of the prices of the complements of an item.
                            currency: 
                              type: string
                              example: "ARS"
                              description: Currency related to price.
                        totalPrice:
                          type: object
                          description: Total price of an item, considering its quantity and complements.
                          properties:
                            value:
                              type: number
                              example: 1000.0
                              description: Total price of an item, considering its quantity and complements ((unityPrice + optionsPrice) * quantity).
                            currency: 
                              type: string
                              example: "ARS"
                              description: Currency related to price.
                        extension:
                          type: object
                          description: Additional information about the item
                          properties:
                            unitNetPrice:
                              type: object
                              description: In case of the product have a discount, this field will show the information of the value of the product with the applied discount
                              properties:
                                value:
                                  type: number
                                  example: 1000.0
                                  description: Value of the product with discount
                                currency:
                                  type: string
                                  example: "ARS"
                                  description: Currency related to price.
                  otherFees:
                    type: array
                    description: Array of objects with amounts of fees charged by the order. Fees like shipping and operation of the marketplace are included.
                    items:
                      type: object
                      properties:
                        name:
                          type: string
                          example: "Name of the Fee"
                          description: Name of the Fee.
                        type:
                          type: string
                          example: "DELIVERY_FEE"
                          description: Field that specifies the type of the fee. 
                          enum: 
                            - DELIVERY_FEE -- fee charged for shipping the product.
                            - SERVICE_FEE -- fee for the using of Marketplace
                            - TIP -- Value of the tip.
                        receivedBy:
                          type: string
                          example: "MERCHANT"
                          description: Field that specifies who will receive the fee amount. 
                          enum: 
                            - MERCHANT -- the fee amount that will be received by the merchant.
                            - MARKETPLACE -- the fee amount that will be received by the marketplace.
                            - LOGISTIC_SERVICES -- the fee amount that will be received by the Service of Logistic.
                        receiverDocument:
                          type: string
                          example: "3124123141"
                          description: Document of the amount fee receiver.
                        price: 
                          type: object
                          properties:
                            value:
                              type: number
                              example: 119.0
                              description: Price of the fee.
                            currency:
                              type: string
                              example: "ARS"
                              description: Currency related to price. 
                  discounts:
                    type: array
                    description: Information about the discounts that can be applied on cart, items or on delivery fee.
                    items:
                      type: object
                      properties:
                        amount: 
                          type: object
                          properties:
                            value:
                              type: number
                              example: 119.0
                              description: Price of discount.
                            currency:
                              type: string
                              example: "ARS"
                              description: Currency related to value.
                        target:
                          type: string
                          example: "ITEM"
                          description: Where the discount will be applied. 
                          enum: 
                            - CART -- The discount wil be applied on the cart.
                            - DELIVERY_FEE -- The discount will be applied on the delivery fee.
                            - ITEM -- The discount will be applien on an Item
                        targetId:
                          type: string
                          example: "MLA1122759502"
                          description: If the target of the discount is an Item, this field will show the ID of the Item that the discount has been applied.
                        sponsorshipValues:
                          type: array
                          description: 	Values sponsored by either party. The sum of the amounts listed in this atribute must match the value informed in the amount atribute above.
                          items:
                            type: object
                            properties:
                              name:
                                type: string
                                example: "MARKETPLACE"
                                description: Who sponsored the discount.
                                enum:
                                  - MARKETPLACE -- The Marketplace will sponsor the discount.
                                  - MERCHANT -- The Merchant will sponsor the discount.
                              amount: 
                                type: object
                                properties:
                                  value:
                                    type: number
                                    example: 119.0
                                    description: Price of discount.
                                  currency:
                                    type: string
                                    example: "ARS"
                                    description: Currency related to value. 
                        extension:
                          type: object
                          description: Discount coupon information
                          properties:
                            id:
                              type: string
                              example: "21515164-001"
                              description: ID of the coupon
                            name:
                              type: string
                              example: "coupon_off"
                              description: Name fo the coupon
                  total:
                    type: object
                    description: Object that contains information about all amounts charged
                    properties:
                      itemsPrice:
                        type: object
                        description: Total price of the selected items.
                        properties: 
                          value: 
                            type: number
                            example: 1000.0
                            description: Total price of the selected items.
                          currency:
                            type: string
                            example: "ARS"
                            description: Currency related to price.
                      otherFees:
                        type: object
                        description: Sum of all fees.
                        properties: 
                          value: 
                            type: number
                            example: 119.0
                            description: Sum of all fees.
                          currency:
                            type: string
                            example: "ARS"
                            description: Currency related to price.
                      discount:
                        type: object
                        description: Sum of all discounts.
                        properties: 
                          value: 
                            type: number
                            example: 0.0
                            description: Sum of all discounts.
                          currency:
                            type: string
                            example: "ARS"
                            description: Currency related to price. 
                      orderAmount:
                        type: object
                        description: Total value paid on the order.
                        properties: 
                          value: 
                            type: number
                            example: 1119.0
                            description: Total value paid on the order (itemsPrice + otherFees - discounts).
                          currency:
                            type: string
                            example: "ARS"
                            description: Currency related to price.
                  payments:
                    type: object
                    description: Payment method information.
                    x-description-i18n:
                      eng: Payment method information.
                      spa: Información de los medios de pago
                      por: Informação dos meios de pagamento
                    properties:
                      prepaid:
                        type: number
                        description: Amount that has already been paid.
                        example: 1119.0
                      pending:
                        type: number
                        description: Amount for which payment is still pending.
                        example: 0
                      methods:
                        type: array
                        description: Payment methods used.
                        items:
                          type: object
                          properties:
                            value:
                              type: number
                              description: Value paid.
                            currency:
                              type: string
                              example: "ARS"
                              description: Currency related to the payment.
                            type:
                              type: string
                              description: Time when the payment was or will be made. By now, the only possible value for this field is PREPAID.
                              example: "PREPAID"
                            method:
                              type: string
                              description: Method used for payment.
                              enum:
                                - DIGITAL_WALLET -- amount paid using the Digital Wallet of Mercado Pago.
                              example: "DIGITAL_WALLET"
                  customer:
                    type: object
                    description: Information about the buyer.
                    properties:
                      id:
                        type: string
                        description: User ID of the buyer.
                        example: "1071059933"
                      name:
                        type: string
                        description: Name of the buyer.
                        example: "Test User"
                      phone:
                        type: object
                        properties:
                          number:
                            type: string
                            description: Buyer´s phone number.
                            example: "011 123456789"
                      documentNumber:
                        type: string
                        description: Buyer´s ID number.
                        example: "2731234567894"
                  delivery:
                    type: object
                    description: Information about the location where the order should be delivered.
                    properties:
                      deliveredBy:
                        type: string
                        description: Responsible for order delivery.
                        enum:
                          - MERCHANT -- the restaurant is responsible for the order delivery.
                        example: "MERCHANT"
                      deliveryAddress:
                        type: object
                        properties:
                          country:
                            type: string
                            description: Name of the country.
                            example: "Argetina"
                          state:
                            type: string
                            description: Name of the state.
                            example: "Capital Federal"
                          city: 
                            type: string
                            description: Name of the city.
                            example: "Santos Lugares"
                          streetName:
                            type: string
                            description: Name of the street.
                            example: "Calle 01"
                          streetNumber:
                            type: string
                            description: Number of the delivery location. If there is no number, the value will be SN.
                            example: "1523"
                          complement:
                            type: string
                            description: Additional information about the place of delivery.
                            example: "APTO 58"
                          reference:
                            type: string
                            description: References about the delivery location.
                            example: "Referencia: Next to bakery"
                          formattedAddress:
                            type: string
                            description: Concatenation of street name and number.
                            example: "Calle 01 1523"
                          postalCode:
                            type: string
                            description: Zipcode of the delivery location.
                            example: "1428"
                          coordinates:
                            type: object
                            properties:
                              latitude:
                                type: number
                                description: Latitude of the delivery location.
                                example: -34.55864
                              longitude:
                                type: number
                                description: Longitude of the delivery location.
                                example: -58.457982
                      estimatedDeliveryDateTime:
                        type: string
                        description: Estimated delivery time (UTC date-time in ISO timestamp format).
                        example: "2022-02-21T21:49:55Z"
                      deliveryDateTime:
                        type: string
                        description: Delivery completion time (UTC date-time in ISO timestamp format). This information will be setted once the order was delivered.
                        example: "2022-02-21T21:52:55Z"
                  extension:
                    type: object
                    properties:
                      status:
                        type: string
                        description: Status of an order.
                        enum:
                          - ready_to_ship -- order created.
                          - shipped -- order sent for delivery.
                          - not_delivered -- order not delivered.
                          - delivered -- order delivered.
                          - cancelled -- order cancelled.
                        example: "ready_to_ship"
                      substatus:
                        type: string
                        description: Substatus of an order, along with the status they define the current state of an order.
                        enum:
                          - ready_to_print -- order awaiting acceptance.
                          - printed -- order accepted.
                          - out_for_delivery -- order went out for delivery.
                          - delivery_failed -- delivery not completed.
                        example: "printed"
                      store:
                        type: object
                        properties:
                          id:
                            type: string
                            description: Internal ID of the store used by Mercado Pago.
                            example: "44905357"
                          externalCode:
                            type: string
                            description: An optional field that refeers to a external code that can be used on a point of sale. This external code can be set by the Mercado Pago Delivery API.
                            example: "UNID01"
                      qr:
                        type: object
                        description: Through the information contained in this Object, it is possible to assemble the QR Code that is read through the "Mercado Envios Flex" APP for the continuation of the delivery flow of an order. In this way it is possible to develop a personalized coupon for an order. To test the operation of this QR Code, simply read it through the "Mercado Envios Flex" App.
                        properties:
                          id:
                            type: string
                            description: ID of the Order.
                            example: "41382089428"
                          sender_id:
                            type: number
                            description: ID of the Seller.
                            example: 1068595961
                          hash_code:
                            type: string
                            description: Hash that will be displayed after the order is accepted.
                            example: "v3Xtt15eewkj3Eu2lZt+cJQgDj3H6AHb04y1cMO4nPI="
                          security_digit:
                            type: string
                            description: Security information code.
                            example: "0"
        '401':
          description: Error
          x-description-i18n:
            eng: Error
            spa: Error
            por: Erro
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                properties:
                  errorKey: 
                    type: string
                    enum:
                      - 401-- Unauthorized - Access Token is invalid            
        '403':
          description: Error
          x-description-i18n:
            eng: Error
            spa: Error
            por: Erro
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                 type: object
                 properties:
                    errorKey:
                      type: string
                      enum:
                        - 403-- Forbidden - User cannot access this resource 
        '404':
          description: Error
          x-description-i18n:
            eng: Error
            spa: Error
            por: Erro
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                properties:
                  errorKey:
                    type: string
                    enum:
                      - 404-- Not Found - Failed to search shipment
                      
        '424':
          description: Error
          x-description-i18n:
            eng: Error
            spa: Error
            por: Erro
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                properties:
                  errorKey:
                    type: string
                    enum:
                      - 424-- Not Found - Failed to get some information of the order 
        '500':
          description: Error
          x-description-i18n:
            eng: Error
            spa: Error
            por: Erro
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                properties:
                  errorKey:
                    type: string
                    enum:
                      - 500-- Internal server error  
                      
  /proximity-integration/shipments/{shipment_id}/accept:
    put:
      tags:
        - $ref: '#/tags/mp-delivery'
      summary: Accept order
      description: This endpoint is used to accept an order, and change its status
      parameters:
        - name: shipment_id
          in: path
          description: Unique ID that identifies the shipment of the order to be performed by the operation to accept an order. 
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
            example: 41034141533  
      requestBody:
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              type: object
              properties:
                status:
                  type: string
                  description: This property indicates the order status, which must have the value "accepted" for this endpoint. 
                  example: "accepted"
      responses:
        '200':
          description: Success
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                properties:
                  status:
                    type: string
                    description: Status of the order after its acceptance. The Status value that will be returned is "accepted".
                    example: accepted   
        '400':
          description: Error
          x-description-i18n:
            eng: Error
            spa: Error
            por: Erro
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                properties:
                  errorKey: 
                    type: string
                    enum:
                      - 400-- Conflict-error - This order cannot be accepted due to its current status.
        '401':
          description: Error
          x-description-i18n:
            eng: Error
            spa: Error
            por: Erro
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                properties:
                  errorKey: 
                    type: string
                    enum:
                      - 401-- Unauthorized - Access Token is invalid 
        '403':
          description: Error
          x-description-i18n:
            eng: Error
            spa: Error
            por: Erro
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                 type: object
                 properties:
                    errorKey:
                      type: string
                      enum:
                        - 403-- Forbidden - User cannot access this resource 
                      
        '424':
          description: Error
          x-description-i18n:
            eng: Error
            spa: Error
            por: Erro
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                properties:
                  errorKey:
                    type: string
                    enum:
                      - 424-- Not Found - Failed to get some information of the order 
        '500':
          description: Error
          x-description-i18n:
            eng: Error
            spa: Error
            por: Erro
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                properties:
                  errorKey:
                    type: string
                    enum:
                      - 500-- Internal server error  
  /proximity-integration/shipments/{shipment_id}/print_label_pdf:
    get:
      tags:
        - $ref: '#/tags/mp-delivery'
      summary: Print/get order coupon
      description: This endpoint is used to accept an order and, in addition, it returns the PDF file for the order coupon
      parameters:
        - name: shipment_id
          in: path
          description: Unique ID that identifies the shipment of the order to be performed by the operations to accept and print an order. 
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
            example: 41034141533
      responses:
        '200':
          description: Success
          content:
            application/pdf:
              schema:
                type: string
                format: binary
                description: A binary code referring to the PDF coupon.
        '401':
          description: Error
          x-description-i18n:
            eng: Error
            spa: Error
            por: Erro
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                properties:
                  errorKey: 
                    type: string
                    enum:
                      - 401-- Unauthorized - Access Token is invalid 
        '403':
          description: Error
          x-description-i18n:
            eng: Error
            spa: Error
            por: Erro
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                 type: object
                 properties:
                    errorKey:
                      type: string
                      enum:
                        - 403-- Forbidden - User cannot access this resource 
                      
        '424':
          description: Error
          x-description-i18n:
            eng: Error
            spa: Error
            por: Erro
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                properties:
                  errorKey:
                    type: string
                    enum:
                      - 424-- Not Found - Failed to get some information of the order 
        '500':
          description: Error
          x-description-i18n:
            eng: Error
            spa: Error
            por: Erro
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                properties:
                  errorKey:
                    type: string
                    enum:
                      - 500-- Internal server error
  /proximity-integration/shipments/{shipment_id}/cancellation-reasons:
    put:
      tags:
        - $ref: '#/tags/mp-delivery'
      summary: Reasons for cancellation
      description: This endpoint returns the cancellation reasons that are available for an order. It is important to remember that cancellation reasons vary depending on the current status of the order.
      parameters:
        - name: shipment_id
          in: path
          description: Unique ID that identifies the shipment of the order. 
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
            example: 41034141533
      responses:
        '200':
          description: Success
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: array
                description: Array of reasons of cancellation.
                items:
                  type: object
                  properties:
                    id:
                      type: string
                      description: ID of the reason of cancellation.
                      example: CS7452
                    value:
                      type: string
                      description: Name of the reason of cancellation.
                      example: out_of_stock
                    message:
                      type: string
                      description: Description of the reason of cancellation.
                      example: Me falta alguno de los productos.
        '401':
          description: Error
          x-description-i18n:
            eng: Error
            spa: Error
            por: Erro
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                properties:
                  errorKey: 
                    type: string
                    enum:
                      - 401-- Unauthorized - Access Token is invalid 
        '403':
          description: Error
          x-description-i18n:
            eng: Error
            spa: Error
            por: Erro
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                 type: object
                 properties:
                    errorKey:
                      type: string
                      enum:
                        - 403-- Forbidden - User cannot access this resource 
                      
        '424':
          description: Error
          x-description-i18n:
            eng: Error
            spa: Error
            por: Erro
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                properties:
                  errorKey:
                    type: string
                    enum:
                      - 424-- Not Found - Failed to get some information of the order 
        '500':
          description: Error
          x-description-i18n:
            eng: Error
            spa: Error
            por: Erro
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                properties:
                  errorKey:
                    type: string
                    enum:
                      - 500-- Internal server error 
  /proximity-integration/shipments/{shipment_id}/cancel:
    put:
      tags:
        - $ref: '#/tags/mp-delivery'
      summary: Cancel order
      description: This endpoint cancels an order, changing its status. 
      parameters:
        - name: shipment_id
          in: path
          description: Unique ID that identifies the shipment of the order to be performed by the operations to accept and print an order. 
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
            example: 41034141533
      requestBody:
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              type: object
              properties:
                status:
                  type: string
                  description: This property indicates the order status, which must have the value "cancelled" for this endpoint.
                  example: "cancelled"
                cancellation_reason:
                  type: object
                  description: Reason of the cancellation that was retrieved from the endpoint of cancellation reason.
                  properties:
                    id:
                      type: string
                      description: ID of the reason of cancellation.
                      example: CS7452
                    value:
                      type: string
                      description: Name of the reason of cancellation.
                      example: out_of_stock
                    message:
                      type: string
                      description: Description of the reason of cancellation.
                      example: Me falta alguno de los productos.
           
      responses:
        '200':
          description: Success
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                properties:
                  status:
                    type: string
                    description: Status of the order after its cancellation. The Status value that will be returned is "cancelled".
                    example: cancelled
        '400':
          description: Error
          x-description-i18n:
            eng: Error
            spa: Error
            por: Erro
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                properties:
                  errorKey: 
                    type: string
                    enum:
                      - 400-- Conflict-error - This order cannot be cancelled due to its current status.
        '401':
          description: Error
          x-description-i18n:
            eng: Error
            spa: Error
            por: Erro
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                properties:
                  errorKey: 
                    type: string
                    enum:
                      - 401-- Unauthorized - Access Token is invalid 
        '403':
          description: Error
          x-description-i18n:
            eng: Error
            spa: Error
            por: Erro
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                 type: object
                 properties:
                    errorKey:
                      type: string
                      enum:
                        - 403-- Forbidden - User cannot access this resource 
                      
        '424':
          description: Error
          x-description-i18n:
            eng: Error
            spa: Error
            por: Erro
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                properties:
                  errorKey:
                    type: string
                    enum:
                      - 424-- Not Found - Failed to get some information of the order 
        '500':
          description: Error
          x-description-i18n:
            eng: Error
            spa: Error
            por: Erro
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                properties:
                  errorKey:
                    type: string
                    enum:
                      - 500-- Internal server error 
  /proximity-integration/users/{seller_id}/stores:
    get:
      tags:
        - $ref: '#/tags/mp-delivery'
      summary: Get all stores
      description: This endpoint returns all stores owned by a user, using the User ID as search filter
      parameters:
        - name: seller_id
          in: path
          description: Unique ID that identifies the user that will be used as search filter to consult stores.
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
            example: 41562083
      responses:
        '200':
          description: Success
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:          
                type: array
                description: List of stores referring to the searched User ID.
                items:
                  type: object
                  properties:
                    id:
                      type: number
                      example: 41517088
                      description: Unique ID that identifies the store.
                    user_id:
                      type: number
                      example: 813887163
                      description: Unique ID that identifies the user who owns the store.
                    description:
                      type: string
                      example: "Doc's grocery store"
                      description: Name of the store.
                    business_hours:
                      type: object
                      description: List of store opening hours. Each attribute of the object will be represented by a day of the week. 
                      properties:
                       monday:
                         type: array
                         description: List of store opening hours on that weekday. 
                         items:
                           type: object
                           properties:
                             open:
                               type: string
                               example: "8:00"
                               description: Store opening time on that weekday.
                             close:
                               type: string
                               example: "15:00"
                               description: Store closing time on that weekday.
                       tuesday:
                         type: array
                         description: List of store opening hours on that weekday.
                         items:
                           type: object
                           properties:
                             open:
                               type: string
                               example: "8:00"
                               description: Store opening time on that weekday.
                             close:
                               type: string
                               example: "15:00"
                               description: Store closing time on that weekday.
                       wendsday:
                         type: array
                         description: List of store opening hours on that weekday.
                         items:
                           type: object
                           properties:
                             open:
                               type: string
                               example: "8:00"
                               description: Store opening time on that weekday.
                             close:
                               type: string
                               example: "15:00"
                               description: Store closing time on that weekday.
                       thursday:
                         type: array
                         description: List of store opening hours on that weekday.
                         items:
                           type: object
                           properties:
                             open:
                               type: string
                               example: "8:00"
                               description: Store opening time on that weekday.
                             close:
                               type: string
                               example: "15:00"
                               description: Store closing time on that weekday.
                       friday:
                         type: array
                         description: List of store opening hours on that weekday.
                         items:
                           type: object
                           properties:
                             open:
                               type: string
                               example: "8:00"
                               description: Store opening time on that weekday.
                             close:
                               type: string
                               example: "15:00"
                               description: Store closing time on that weekday.
                    location: 
                      type: object
                      description: Store location information. This includes address, latitute, longitude, and additional location references.
                      properties:
                        address_line:
                          type: string
                          description: Store address information
                          example: "Viaduto Arapuã - Saude, São Paulo - SP, 04307-070, Brasil"
                        reference:
                          type: string
                          description: Additional information provided for store location.
                          example: "Next to a bakery"
                        latitude:
                          type: number
                          description: Latitude of the store.
                          example: -23.630159633405057
                        longitude:
                          type: number
                          description: Longitude of the store.
                          example: -46.64532809999999
                    external_id:
                      type: string
                      description: This optional property indicates the custom external ID of the store. This value can be changed or updated using the endpoint that updates External IDs. 
                      example: "A15154DE"
        '401':
          description: Error
          x-description-i18n:
            eng: Error
            spa: Error
            por: Erro
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                properties:
                  errorKey: 
                    type: string
                    enum:
                      - 401-- Unauthorized - Access Token is invalid 
        '403':
          description: Error
          x-description-i18n:
            eng: Error
            spa: Error
            por: Erro
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                 type: object
                 properties:
                    errorKey:
                      type: string
                      enum:
                        - 403-- Forbidden - User cannot access this resource 
                      
        '424':
          description: Error
          x-description-i18n:
            eng: Error
            spa: Error
            por: Erro
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                properties:
                  errorKey:
                    type: string
                    enum:
                      - 424-- Not Found - Failed to get some information of the stores 
        '500':
          description: Error
          x-description-i18n:
            eng: Error
            spa: Error
            por: Erro
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                properties:
                  errorKey:
                    type: string
                    enum:
                      - 500-- Internal server error 
  /proximity-integration/stores/{StoreID}:
    get:
      tags:
        - $ref: '#/tags/mp-delivery'
      summary: Get specific store
      description: This endpoint is used to get a specific store using its ID as search filter
      parameters:
        - name: StoreID
          in: path
          description: Unique ID that identifies the store that will be used as search parameter. 
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
            example: 185522600
      responses:
        '200':
          description: Success
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                properties:
                  id:
                    type: number
                    example: 41517088
                    description: Unique ID that identifies the store.  
                  user_id:
                    type: number
                    example: 813887163
                    description: Unique ID that identifies the user who owns the store.
                  description:
                    type: string
                    example: "Doc's grocery store"
                    description: Name of the store.
                  status:
                    type: string
                    example: "enabled"
                    description: Status referring to the current state of operation of the store.
                    enum:
                      - disabled -- The store is disabled, and will not be shown on marketplace.
                      - enabled -- The store is enabled and is shown on marketplace.
                      - paused -- The delivery of store is paused, but the store will cotinue to be shown on marketplace.
                  business_hours:
                    type: object
                    description: List of store opening hours. Each attribute of the object will be represented by a day of the week.

                      monday:
                        type: array

                              description: Store closing time on that weekday.

                        description: List of store opening hours on that weekday.

                          type: object
                          properties:
                            open:
                              type: string

                              description: Store opening time on that weekday.
                            close:

                              example: "15:00"
                              description: Store closing time on that weekday.

                              description: Store opening time on that weekday.

                              type: string
                              example: "15:00"
                              description: Store closing time on that weekday.

                        items:
                          type: object
                          properties:
                            open:
                              type: string
                              example: "8:00"
                              description: Store opening time on that weekday.
                            close:
                              type: string
                              example: "15:00"
                              description: Store closing time on that weekday.
                      friday:
                        type: array
                        description: List of store opening hours on that weekday.
                        items:
                          type: object
                          properties:
                            open:
                              type: string
                              example: "8:00"
                              description: Store opening time on that weekday.
                            close:
                              type: string
                              example: "15:00"
                              description: Store closing time on that weekday.
                  location: 
                    type: object
                    description: Store location information. This includes address, latitute, longitude, and additional location references.
                    properties:
                      address_line:
                        type: string
                        description: Store address information 
                        example: "Viaduto Arapuã - Saude, São Paulo - SP, 04307-070, Brasil"
                      reference:
                        type: string
                        description: Store location add-on.
                        example: "Next to a bakery"
                      latitude:
                        type: number
                        description: Latitude of the store.
                        example: -23.630159633405057
                      longitude:
                        type: number
                        description: Longitude of the store.
                        example: -46.64532809999999
                  external_id:

  /proximity-integration/stores/{store_id}/status:
    put:
      tags:
        - $ref: '#/tags/mp-delivery'
      summary: Update store status
      description: This endpoint changes the operation status of a store
      parameters:
        - name: store_id
          in: path
          description: Unique ID that identifies the store whose status will be updated.
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
            example: 4101533
      requestBody:
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              type: object
              properties:
                status:
                  type: string
                  example: "enabled"
                  description: Status referring to the current state of operation of the store.
                  enum:
                    - disabled -- The store is disabled, and will not be shown on marketplace.
                    - enabled -- The store is enabled and is shown on marketplace.
                    - paused -- The delivery of store is paused, but the store will cotinue to be shown on marketplace.
      responses:
        '200':
          description: Success
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                properties:
                  id:
                    type: number
                    example: 41517088
                    description: Unique ID that identifies the store.  
                  user_id:
                    type: number
                    example: 813887163

                  location:
